hotels.title: Hotel Sea Crown
hotels.details: Situated on the beachfront and offering a 24-hour front desk, Hotel Sea Crown is located just 1.5 km from the famous Sugandha Beach. Free WiFi access is available.

hotels.title: Long Beach Hotel
hotels.details: Offering an indoor pool, a fitness centre and a spa and wellness centre, Long Beach Hotel is located 3.3 km from the Cox's Bazar Airport and Local Bus Station.

hotels.title: Best Western Heritage
hotels.details: Set in Cox's Bazar, Best Western Heritage offers 4-star accommodation with a garden. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space.

hotels.title: D' more Sajek Valley Hotel & Resort
hotels.details: D' more Sajek Valley Hotel & Resort is a 3-star property set in Māhmuam. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel features family rooms.

hotels.title: Hotel Prince
hotels.details: Hotel Prince is offering accommodation in Rāngāmāti. Guests can enjoy city views. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box.

hotels.title: Hotel Hill Ambassador
hotels.details: Hotel Hill Ambassador is a 2-star property located in Rāngāmāti. Each accommodation at the 2-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a restaurant.

hotels.title: Hotel Green Castle
hotels.details: Hotel Green Castle is located in Rāngāmāti. The hotel also provides free WiFi and free private parking. The reception at the hotel can provide tips on the area.

hotels.title: Hotel Hill View
hotels.details: Set in Bāndarban, Hotel Hill View features 3-star accommodation with private balconies.

hotels.title: Bono Nibash Hill Resort
hotels.details: Located in Bāndarban, Bono Nibash Hill Resort offers 3-star accommodation with a garden and a restaurant. This 3-star resort offers room service and a 24-hour front desk.

hotels.title: Fanush Resort
hotels.details: Situated in Bāndarban, Fanush Resort offers 3-star accommodation with a garden, a terrace and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service. All rooms have a patio with mountain views.
